column1: ukuhlanganyela kwethu nesiqhema samazwe webrics ngomnyaka wee2010 kwaba silinganisoliqha esi qakathekileko emzameni wethu wokuthuthukisa ama qalontanzi welizwe lekhethu ngokwakha ubudlelwano obuqinileko namazwe wemi notho esakhulako, ibrazil, irussia, iindia kunye nechina.
